name: IVY Skin Clinic - India
description: The IvySkin Clinic is a well-equipped dermatology and cosmetic clinic, with a team of qualified professionals including a Dermatologist, Dr. Manish. We have been in this field for 20 years and offer you the best of care to keep your skin looking young and healthy.
Headline: Skin expert for you
ShortDescription: We are IVY Skin Clinic, the one place where qualified professionals take care of your skin, hair and breasts in the most scientific manner.
enhanced_description: IVY Skin Clinic, located in Pune, Maharashtra, India, is a well-established dermatology and cosmetic clinic with 20 years of experience since its launch in 2008. It boasts a team of qualified professionals, including Dermatologist Dr. Manish, providing comprehensive skin, hair, and breast care. The clinic offers a personalized approach to its services, empowering individuals with medical knowledge to maintain youthful and healthy skin. Positioned within the corporate wellness sector, IVY Skin Clinic serves as a health & safety provider aimed at improving employee happiness and engagement through well-being services.
key_use_cases: Providing dermatology and cosmetic services as part of an employee wellness program
Offering medical consultation and treatment for skin, hair, and breast health to employees
Educating employees on skin health and general well-being
Contributing to employee happiness and engagement through health benefits
